column3: str

Vuyargur has received another golem repair request.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
Deliver the requested items to the golem tinkerer.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Speak with Xarhorkur at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

<hex:0208F20310E4E8050AFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFF202B2><hex:0208F202ACE4E8050BFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFF2024E><hex:0208F20248E4E8050CFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFF201EA><hex:0208F201E4E4E80509FF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFF20186><hex:0208F20180E4E8050DFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFF20122><hex:0208F2011CE4E8050EFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FFC1><hex:0208BDE4E8050FFF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FF61><hex:02085DE4E80510FF55><hex:020851E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF2E>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to the golem tinkerer<hex:03><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Forgive me, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>, but could I entrust you with more golem maintenance? Though its function is restored, a construct of its age needs regular upkeep.
In the time since your last repair, a new malfunction has arisen, and it seems more parts will need replacing.
Xarhorkur should have more information for you. You'll find her at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
Glad you're here, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. The components we need are rather intricate, which is why I requested you and your deft hands for the job.
Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to forge them right here. Let me know if you run out!
Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to construct them right here. Let me know if you run out!
Lest you worry, I've got all the materials you need to prepare them right here. Let me know if you run out!
Oh, and once you've finished, go ahead and take them to the tinkerer for installation.
Need more materials? ...No, evidently not. Carry on, then! The tinkerer will be glad to see you!
Need more materials? Certainly! Here you are.
Hrmmm... Perhaps I ought to fine-tune the motor component...?
Your presence is a welcome one, <hex:020811E905FF05>miss<hex:FF07>mister<hex:03> artisan. Have you a job in need of the golem's strength?
Oh, you're a saint! With any luck, these replacement parts will stop it from making that dreadful grinding sound... The keeper will be thrilled!
Oh, your timing couldn't be better! Whatever was causing that delayed response time, these replacement parts ought to fix it. The keeper will be thrilled!
Granted, we're still learning through trial and error at this stage, so we may have need to call upon you again, if that's all right. Many thanks!
Once again, our golem is restored by your hand. Thank you, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>.
Doubtless you have witnessed similar constructs in the region of Yak T'el─the former guardians of the old quarries.
I should like to see them for myself one day, to take comfort in the unweathered vestiges of our ancestors.
Much like our sepulchres, the structures we build are bearers of memory. It is a golem's duty to ensure they last for generations, and ours to ensure the golems do the same.
